How many times do i have to verify the files for this game? I have done it 10+ times. its like every update i have to do it. fix your game.

This game is a great example of a game that starts out great and then begins to deteriorate as the developers fail to balance the new abilities they add in over time, resulting in a game that is so skewed towards survivors that no one wants to play killer above Rank 10. The matchmaking is also horrible, as Survive With Friends causes Rank 20 killers to be matched with Rank 2 survivors because people get to play with whoever they want and get a free boost across the whole game. Playing survivor is marginally fun but gets boring the further it goes on because once you know what you're doing the game gets to be monotonous and boring. Playing survivor can be difficult however the horror dies around Rank 15 and the killer gets to be more scared of your ability to run. Your ability to get away should be based on if you can be clever but instead it's just about however many pallets you can slap down and loop until the killer gets you, or he makes a mistake and loses track of where you are. Match length is also annoying short and I believe should be slowed down to about 20 minutes at a time based on gen repair speed, if gens took longer to repair than the game would be fixed in a lot of ways because long chases would make more sense.
A very fun game until the matchmaking system places you against red ranks when you're in yellow. Expect toxicity in every game; how you combat it is up to you.
Don't have the most amount of hours in this game but its still really fun :) (even better when you play with friends)

Difficile de décrire DBD en quelques lignes, néanmoins je vais essayer. J'ai été accro assez vite, dès les premières parties, car j'ai eu la chance d'avoir quelques amis pour m'expliquer le jeu et m'aider à mieux apprécier sa profondeur. A la base, je me disais que c'était un peu simplet et lassant... Et puis j'ai compris que DBD était un jeu compétitif.
En regardant des joueurs bien jouer, ça a été l'illumination... et je ne lâche plus le jeu depuis. 
DBD vous procurera des sensations uniques grâce à son gameplay asymétrique. Dans tous les cas, la tension est au rendez-vous... et le fun aussi (parce certaines situations peuvent parfois devenir bien comiques).
Essayez le, en plus le jeu est mis à jour régulièrement et le contenu est déjà costaud à appréhender ! Rien d'impossible, mais il y a quand même pas mal de survivants/tueurs chacun avec leurs 3 skills uniques !
---
Edit : plus de 1000 heures dessus et toujours accro.

This game has to be one of the most fun and toxic games I have ever played! At times players can be toxic and try to ruin gameplay for you but at other times you can have some of the most fun you've ever had playing a game before. I highly recommend playing "survivor with friends" as its a lot more fun playing with friends and communicating with each other. This game at times will take strategy and skill and at other times you will feel like you're on auto-pilot. It depends on certain situations. 

If I had to rate this game on scale 1-10.
9.5/10.
Bugs/Glitches/Exploits have been a ongoing issue with this game since the start, but the devs are always on top of it.
New killers/survivors are added frequently which keeps the game relevant and will keep you coming back.


If you don't have this game yet, GET IT NOW. It's a must have!

Jogo de terror e suspense, muito divertido de se jogar com os amigos. Os desenvolvedores não param de colocar novas atualizações e novos eventos no jogo, além é claro de novos personagens (tanto sobreviventes como assasinos).

Правила для манов

1)Играть без перков и без аддонов

2)Если ты играешь за Траппера/Охотника и в твою траппу кто то попался тебе срочно нужно освободить его сломать все свой трапы и ждать наказания

3)Вы не имеете право хитовать/бить сурвов им больно ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ как не как

4)Если вы ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ который положил несчастного сурва должны дождаться другого с фонариком который накажет вас и спасёт бедолагу

5)Нельзя уклоняться от фонарика вы думаете им приятно тратить на вас свой фонарик ?

6)Если сурв залез в шкаф вы должны сделать вид что не заметили его и пройти мимо

7) Если вы взяли Порчу вы обязаны показать выжившим где он находиться и извиниться что вы родились

8)Вам запрещено кемпить

9) Запрещено туннеллить

10) Если вы ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ который нарушили 8 и 9 правило то следуйте 12

11)Нельзя уклоняться от палет нужно ловить их ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥м с гордостью

12) Если вы нарушили правило то вы должны стать в палету и ждать когда будет наказания

13)Если играете за Аню/Охотницу вы должны кидать топоры только в землю

14) Если вы попали топором в бедолагу сурва вы должны удалить игру на♥♥♥♥♥♥

15)Нельзя бить генераторы если так хочется иди себе ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ побей ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ конченный

16)Если сурвы встретили Бубаса/Каниббала то обязаны набить ему ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ палетой


17)Если играете за Рин Ямаока вы должны как даун не использовать свою абилку и ходить как обычный пеший ман


18)Запрещено ливать из игры если вы это сделали взяли и кинули сами себе репорт

19)Если сурв взял Гирлянды или Bloddy Party вы обязаны встать в уголку и не мешать фарму

20)Если встретили Стелсера так и быть можете его обосцать и унизить

21)Запрещено играя за Нюрсу использовать Блинки

22)Запрещено перелазить окна

23)Если у вас появилась 3 BloodLust Вы обязаны встать в угол и ждать когда он кончется

24)Вам запрещено подходить к выжившим

25)Если играете за Майкла запрещно набирать 2 и 3 фазу

26 )Если вы играете за Бубаса вы обязаны врезаться в стену на своей бензопиле

27)Запрещено использовать Memento Mori

28 если всё таки ты использовал его о дружок у тебя Рак мозга

29)Запрещено контрить 360 и 180

30)Если вас зовут Риша то можете забыть про правила всё ровно без них вы тоже самое что с ними

31)нельзя отворачиваться когда сурв присидает и щёлкает фонариком досмотри до конца Тряпка

32)Если будешь соблюдать все правила то с каждым разом твоё ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ будет на 72 палеты разбито меньше

33)Если сурв всё таки кинул палету вы должны отойти и смотреть на неё

34 )Если вы Биляс - вы должны пилой врезаться в стенку/камень

35)Если вы Хага - вы не должны использовать свою способность,сурвы боятся скримеров

36)Если вы Чума - не используйте блевотину,вам приятно,когда на вас блеют?

37)Если вы легион - вы должны промахиваться своей способностью,она слишком имбовая

38)Если вы Крик - вы должны отпустить сурвов и поприсидать им около ворот

39)Если вы Майкл - хватит ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ на сурвов,иначе ножик будет в волосах весь

40)Если вы Свинка - вы должны сесть в углу карты и дать сурвам возможность похрюкать

41)Если вы соблюдаете все правила - пишите ниже,и мы вам ни♥♥♥♥♥♥ не дадим)

Было б чётко и приятно, если бы не дисбаланс в сторону выживших (ну ладно, с ним-то ещё можно жить) и, что самое важное, дисбаланс в подборе игроков на матч. А именно: когда играешь за убийц (это заметно только в игре за них) выживших подбирает практически всегда (9 из 10 случаев) на 5 и более рангов выше твоего. Причём зачастую все четверо выживших выше рангом. Я начал играть, как и все, на 20 ранге и буквально в каждой катке игроки во много превосходят меня в плане прокачки и ранга (скилл сейчас учитывать особо смысла нет, ибо речь не об этом); было даже один раз так, что со мной играл челик со 2 ранга (напомню - я на 20). А так игра очень даже хороша, и геймплей увлекает.
З.Ы. А ещё периодически игра крашит, будто нажал F4 (нет, я её не нажимал).

Banal rules of the game, a decent dose of adrenaline and a bit of frustration - this is how Dead by Daylight can be summed up in a nutshell. An offer for everyone who wants to feel like in a movie like "Friday the 13th".

The basics are fabulously - or rather: horrible - simple. There are four defenseless teenagers and one serial killer in the closed location. The goal of the youth is to escape, and the killer must hunt down terrified people.

Playing as one of the potential victims, we must have eyes around our head. In order to activate the gates leading to freedom, you need to activate five generators - there are always more of them on the entire map, so as not to lead to a dead end, when one remains to be turned on and the murderer is just waiting by it.

So we sneak up, hide behind walls and trees, take our time, so as not to scare the birds off, and listen, all the time going towards the nearest generator. When the killer is close, the music changes accordingly and the atmosphere thickens - although Dead by Daylight is an online production, it can scare you.

Once you reach the device, you only need to hold down one button. At the same time, however, we must carefully look at one point on the screen, because it is possible that you will have to press the second key at the indicated moment - if we fail, the generator will explode, drawing the attention of the madman. The need to watch carefully when repairing and look for a quick-time event is a well-thought-out mechanism. We cannot freely look around and this makes us a little panicked.

As a representative of young people, we observe the action from the perspective of a third person, which gives an advantage in playing hide and seek. We can also press a button to run faster. Often, however, it is not possible to plan everything well, we will start running too late and we cannot lose the murderer.

When we get caught, the maniac hangs us from one of several hooks. We are then at the mercy of our companions who can take us down. Self-release is almost miraculous and carries the risk of immediate death. After activating five generators, teenagers can use two gates - open the passage and escape from the fenced-off location with a lifelong trauma.

Meanwhile, playing a murderer is a completely different style of play. The camera goes into first-person mode, which limits the field of view. We also can't use sprint, we are moving at a constant speed all the time. We are also less agile than our victims. It's a pity that Dead by Daylight becomes repetitive a bit too quickly. The generator mode is the only type of fun available. A bit of variety is introduced by the presence of several maps, but the layout of the objects is similar in all of them. It's a pity we didn't get more options to compete and play cat and mouse.

There were also some mistakes that are sad to see in the - theoretically - final version. Rough animations, texture bleed, and weird hit detection are prime examples; Fortunately, it's only discernible occasionally, and not all the time, every round.

Dead by Daylight can scare you, and successful hunting can be rewarding. However, the lack of various game modes means that after a dozen or so hours we do not feel like another repetition of the bloody entertainment, unless three friends are always ready to play together.

Played the game for a little bit, here's what I can say

1. if you play survivor, do it with friends, it'll be more enjoyable

2. if you play killer, do so only if you like challenges. be aware it'll be unfair sometimes

3. in general: don't take this game too seriously, it'll just not make it enjoyable over a long run. I had a toxic love-hate relationship with this game for a long time and it's been a far better experience simply having fun. dbd is just a game, now go play it

If you love to immerse yourself into a game, this is the game for u. Not friendly for all beginner but if you can stay until the end, you will be satisfied and enjoy the bumping heart beats.

Игра превратилась в кусок говна, где обиженные любители геймплея на убийцах ноют и ноют, и вот удача, наныли: теперь игра для выживших НЕ играющих в пати, выглядит как программа сдохни или умри. Проблема которая существовала с самого начала: игра 4 опытных выживших со связью в голосовом чате и игра просто рандомов или пати из 2 игрков - не одно и тоже. Сейчас игра для соло игроков или игроков с 1-2 тиммейтами просто невозможна.
Я не рекомендую игру для новых пользователей, конечно если нет в планах играть исключительно на убийце.

PS:Dies sind meine Erfahrungswerte,und ich habe es seit der Early

every update makes this game worse.

every killer they introduce has a more annoying broken power to play against. the newer maps look good but have horrible gameplay for both survivor and killer. the game has been out for 3 years and they still haven't figured out how to implement dedicated servers with a whole development team. they try to nerf SWF with every other update but only end up completely nerfing solo survivor and ruining the experience if you're not in a SWF. hitboxes are still extremely broken. they constantly nerf survivor meta perks but wont touch killer ones. they keep adding indoor maps that completely ruin the powers of some killers.

the game was much better when I first bought it but the developers are running it into the ground

Любима игра всем советую😁

[b]I can not recommend this game anymore. The Community is extremely toxic where basically everyone hates eachother. Playing Survivor is a pain because killers enjoy ruining peoples fun with annoying gameplay mechanics or lagswitching and playing Killer is a pain because Survivors just disrespect the killer and taunt him in various ways. The end game chat is always the same too. killers hate and flame survivors and survivors hate and flame the killer. Some people even openly admit on their profile that they only play the game to annoy others or to make them angry and for no other reason.
If you are here to have fun or to have a good time this definitely is not a game i could recommend. if you are here to try your hardest to win and are not looking for relaxing or fun gameplay... this might be the game for you. If you want fun and a nice environment i'd suggest to watch some good Dead by Daylight Streams instead of playing the actual game.

Edit:
The endgame is badly designed too. it looks fancy as hell i have to admit but the gameplay mechanics especially including the hatch "solution" is pure garbage. you can just camp it as killer and make it unavailable. as soon as the survivor is close you can simply close the hatch and the survivor cant do anything to escape. the developers of this game dont think things trough. killers get so many buffs and positive changes to make them stronger which is just not needed anymore. they take ages to fix things in survivor favor but when killers benefit from it they take ages. example: huntress hatchet hitbox. the huntress hatchet hitbox is still just horrible as you can even hit survivors around the cornerdue to its sphere shaped hitbox.[/b]

[b]PROS:[/b]
[i]1- love the variation of characters and perks and combos this just makes the game a whole lot better.
2- killers are pretty scary and look really good.
3- you don't need to know more because her comes what will make you hate the game.[/i]

[b]CONS:[/b]
[i]1- as i said, community messed the game up big time if you are new you will rarely get a game with the killer not camping the damn hook.
2- killers in this game are mainly 2 types (campers and farmers), campers (which there are alot and i mean alot of) dont care about winning they just wanna watch you die for 2 minutes.
farmers just wont let you die or escape they will make you do multiple tasks so they can farm blood points (ofc you can report them but that doesn't do sh*t).
3- most of the charecters are DLC's and killers too which is kinda *****.
4- unability to communicate with your team is kinda a bad thing imo i think it's a big part of having fun is saying and hearing some funny stuff i mean it is a video game meant for fun after all.
5- servers are trash and the "host system" is a huge mistake and really exploitable basically the killer is the server host which he/she can higher the ping and just pick off survivors one by one.
6- if you want to see yourself having fun in this game you can murder your friends which is pretty fun or get you some friends to survive with.[/i]
